Articles.Content:
Something I did just for fun... If any of you seen the anime Tenchi Muyo, you probably saw the cabbit that can turn into a giant spaceship that the space pirate Ryoko flew in. The flight is very short-lived so enjoy it while you can...

There's the Ryo-Ohki. Well... sort of... I did my best to stay close to the design...

I didn't have any parts that resembled a giant ball in the center... the Stayputnik is too small for that...

Ryo-Ohki takes off!

Onward, Ryo-Ohki!

Or not... two of the engines burned out before the rest. The parachutes and the airbrakes weren't enough... Fortunately, the real Ryo-Ohki wasn't harmed during this flight...

Craft file (if you wanna play with it): http://www./download/fjdl1grheabinxi/Ryo-Ohki.craft
